message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this valuable product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $18000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between?
Hi Bob, I understand that $15000 is your top offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $17000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet at $17000. I would be willing to pay up to $16000 for the product. Could we find a price that works for both of us?

Hi Bob, I understand that $16000 is your top offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
